name: Llama 3.1 8B Instruct
description: Meta's 8B parameter instruction-tuned language model for efficient text generation

skills.name: Text Generation
skills.description: Generate contextually relevant text based on input prompts
examples: Write a short blog post about artificial intelligence
Create a product description for e-commerce
Generate social media content for a brand

skills.name: Question Answering
skills.description: Provide accurate responses to factual and conceptual questions
examples: What are the main features of quantum computing?
What are the key events of World War II?

skills.name: Content Summarization
skills.description: Create concise summaries of longer texts
examples: Summarize this article about renewable energy
Create a brief overview of this research paper
Provide key points from this product review
